textos_fuente.text: Youth Groups & Schools - Destin, FL | Big Kahuna's Park Skip to content Sep 10 All day Adventure Park Closed View Calendar Sep 10 All day Adventure Park Closed View Calendar Tickets & Passes Park Tickets & Deals Season Passes Gift Cards Plan Your Visit Cabanas & Event Spaces Groups Birthday Parties Park Map Things to Do Attractions Water Park Adventure Park 2025 Events Lineup Eat & Drink Big Kahuna’s Blog Hours & Info Calendar & Hours Directions Park Policies & Tips Jobs About Us Tickets & Passes Park Tickets & Deals Season Passes Gift Cards Plan Your Visit Cabanas & Event Spaces Groups Birthday Parties Park Map Things to Do Attractions Water Park Adventure Park 2025 Events Lineup Eat & Drink Big Kahuna’s Blog Hours & Info Calendar & Hours Directions Park Policies & Tips Jobs About Us YOUTH GROUPS SCHOOLS, SCOUTS, CAMPS & SPORTS Home » Group Reservations » Youth Groups & Schools Camp & School Groups Indoor & Outdoor Activities ALL CAMP & SCHOOL GROUPS RECEIVE: Discount Admission for Groups of 20 or More 1 FREE Chaperone Admission with Every 10 Paid Admissions Camp Director/Principal is FREE Concierge Check-in with Expedited Group Entry Discounted Meal Deals or “Brown Bag It” Lunch Options (Available Mon-Fri Only) Free Parking and Safe Bus Drop Off Camp groups access the 2-Acre outdoor water park at no additional fee! (Water Park opens mid-June) Complimentary Storage (not locked) Reserved seating area for lunch Groups will soak up the fun at Big Kahuna’s! Safety is our #1 Priority-Our Lifeguards are StarGuard Elite Certified! Book Your Group Today! Our Group Team will help you customize any event from attractions to catering options. Contact a Group Specialist to schedule a tour or for additional information: (856) 767-7580 [email protected] Don't Forget! Groups must be booked at least 5 days in advance with a 15% deposit upon booking. SCOUTS Boy and Girl Scout Groups Bring your Scouts to earn a Big Kahuna’s Fun Patch! Troops/Packs can visit during the day or join us for one of our Exclusive Overnight Events. ALL Scout GROUPS RECEIVE: Discount Admission for Groups of 10 or More 1 FREE Chaperone Admission with Every 10 Paid Admissions Concierge Check-in Scouts visiting with their Troop/Pack earn a FREE Big Kahuna’s Fun Patch! Discounts on Pre-Ordered Meal Options Access to the 2-Acre outdoor water park at no additional fee! (Water Park opens mid-June) Book Your Group Today! Our Group Team will help you customize any event from attractions to catering options. Contact a Group Specialist to schedule a tour or for additional information: (856) 767-7580 [email protected] Don't Forget! Groups must be booked at least 5 days in advance with a 15% deposit upon booking. Sports Teams Team Party Time! Whichever game you play, score big when you reward your team! Big Kahuna’s is the ultimate place for team bonding and end of season celebrations. Make your Team Event a Hit! Discount Admission for Groups of 20 or More 1 FREE Chaperone Admission with Every 10 Paid Admissions Concierge Check-in with Expedited Group Entry Discounts on Pre-Ordered Meal Options Access to the 2-Acre outdoor water park at no additional fee! (Water Park opens mid-June) Complimentary Storage (not locked) Reserved seating area for lunch Want to have a pizza party and bring a celebration cake? Ask about adding a private party room! Book Your Group Today! Our Group Team will help you customize any event from attractions to catering options. Contact a Group Specialist to schedule a tour or for additional information: (856) 767-7580 [email protected] Don't Forget! Groups must be booked at least 5 days in advance with a 15% deposit upon booking. Mark Your Calendar! Scout Social Event: Big Kahuna’s will be closed to the General Public and Open for Registered Scout Groups Only. Friday, April 28,  2023 from 6pm – 11pm $ 39 99 PER PERSON (Children 2 years old & younger are FREE) Calling all Scouts! Join us for this splashtastic indoor water park event. This event includes access to the water attractions, and a pizza, salad and dessert buffet served 7:30 – 9:00. All Scouts will earn a Big Kahuna’s Fun Patch! The Chill Zone & Arcade will be open and offering a limited snack menu. (Families are welcome to join – must be included in registered troops’ headcount and final payment) Secure Reservations (20 people paid minimum) by Friday, April 14th Buy Your Scout Social Tickets Today! Our Group Team will help you purchase tickets and customize your event. Contact a Group Specialist to schedule a tour or for additional information: 856-809-4168 [email protected] Stay Social Tag us @bigkahunaswp to get featured Tag us @officialbigkahunas to get featured Follow us @bigkahunaswp to stay in the loop Facebook Instagram Tik Tok Logo quick links Waterpark Tickets Big Kahuna’s Blog Park Hours Jobs About Us FAQs Waterpark Tickets Big Kahuna’s Blog Park Hours Jobs About Us FAQs Get in Touch Contact Us (850) 837-8319 1007 US Highway 98 East Destin, Florida 32541 Become a Big Kahuna Sign Me Up By clicking ‘Sign Me Up’, you agree to receive marketing emails from Big Kahuna’s and agree to our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy. Hawaii Certified SCUBA Divers - Contact Us Contact Info Contact Us! Please, feel free to contact us with any and all questions or concerns you may have before booking your adventure with us. We are more than happy to help explain any of our trips and easy any concerns you may have about SCUBA diving or Snorkel. Also, if you scroll down you can find our frequently asked questions. Email Us Email is the best way to reach us with questions. Better yet, just use the Contact Form below! dive@alohascubadiving.com Call Us We may be underwater when you call, but leave a message and a call back number and we'll return your call as soon as we can. 808-542-9494 Send us an Email Ask us anything!
